content: लाक्षा [लक्ष्यतेऽनया लक्ष् अच् पृषो° वृद्धिः] {@--1@} A kind of red dye, lac; (largely used by women in ancient times as an article of decoration, especially for the soles of the feet and lips; <ab>cf.</ab> अलक्त; it is said to be obtained from the cochineal insect and from the resin of a particular tree); निष्ठ्यूतश्चरणोपभोगसुलभो लाक्षारसः केनाचित् (तरुणा) <ls>Ś. 4. 4</ls>; <ls>Rs. 6. 14</ls>; <ls>Ki. 5. 23.</ls> {@--2@} The insect which produces the red dye.
